channel.title: option on 我的測試區
channel.description: Recent content in option on 我的測試區

item.title: global option in R
item.description: options 沒看到所謂的global option: blogdown.method options(); #> $add.smooth #> [1] TRUE #> #> $blogdown.hugo.version #> [1] "0.84.4" #> #> $blogdown.knit.on_save #> [1] TRUE #> #> $blogdown.method #> [1] "custom" #> #> $blogdown.serve_site.startup #> [1] FALSE #> #> $browserNLdisabled #> [1] FALSE #> #> $CBoundsCheck #> [1] FALSE #> #> $check.bounds #> [1] FALSE #> #> $citation.bibtex.max #> [1] 1 #> #> $continue #> [1] "+ " #> #> $contrasts #> unordered ordered #> "contr.
